Module org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker
Package org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.gui.decorators

Class ButtonDecorator

java.lang.Object
org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.gui.decorators.ButtonDecorator
public class ButtonDecorator extends Object
Decorates buttons. If buttons are already instantiated this class can be used to style them differently. The decorator uses mainly only css style classes. Swing methods should not be used for a better consistency. All methods are static.

    • makeDefaultDeleteButton

      public static void makeDefaultDeleteButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Changes the style of the class to a default delete button. This method clears the css-class of the button and adds the class 'button-delete'
      Parameters:
      button - button that should be decorated

    • makeDefaultGreenButton

      Parameters:
      button - button that should be decorated
